Description: Campbell American Guitars Nelsonic Transitone electric guitar Bill Nelson Signature (printed) Limited Edition 2007 2007 Campbell American Guitar Nelsonic Transitone signature model originally designed and built for Bill Nelson. Features a Rocket Ship Red over a Mahogany body, 25.5″ scale Maple neck, Ebony fingerboard atom inlays at the 12th fret, Campbell “Standards” pickups by Dimarzio Alnico V magnets, Sperzel locking tuners, and strap-locks. Serial no. 022. Nice sounding guitar and getting hard to find. Comes from a private collection, has a couple minor dings on the back neck heel. Comes, trem bar and custom hardshell case. GUITAR BUYER MAGAZINE: “The Nelsonic’s unusual mix of Fender flavours (the scale length and vibrato system) and Gibson influences (the two humbuckers and mahogany body works really well, while still managing to generate the feel of something that’s a bit different from the rest. The sounds and playability are both so good that this guitar feels almost addictive. It’s very hard to put down once you start playing it, and when you grow used to the fact that beneath the quirky image lies an achingly gorgeous and highly usable guitar, there’s almost no going back.” Mahogany BodyFinished in Rocket Ship Red Nitro LacquerMatching HeadstockRock Maple Neck with Tung Oil FinishEbony Fingerboard with atom Inlays at the 12th fretFlattened C Neck Carve22 Medium Jumbo Frets12.5″ Fingerboard Radius25.5″ Scale Length1 11/16ths Nut WidthGraphtech NutGotoh 510 Tremolo15:1 Sperzel TunersGold HardwareCampbell “Standards” Pickups by Dimarzio Alnico V Magnets Wound to 7.25K and 8.65K3-Way Switch, One Volume, Two Tone KnobsCustom Fit G&G Hardshell Case This guitar has hardly been used and apart from the few small chips you can see in the picture, it's in excellent condition. I'm happy to post worldwide, but if you're outside the UK mainland please contact me for a postage quote before buying. I welcome collection in person from South Norwood, London SE25.
Title: Campbell American Guitars Nelsonic Transitone Bill Nelson electric guitar +case
ConditionDescription: Hardly used and in very good condition. There are a few small chips on the red paint.
